about_the_game:
Gameplay:
As Devi, you'll navigate through a web of lies and deceit, using your sharp wit and logical deduction skills. Manage and sort through your comprehensive conversation log, using key pieces of information as evidence to interrogate suspects. The fate of your friend hangs in the balance – can you connect the dots before it's too late?

Key Features:
  • Immerse yourself in a rich, story-driven experience set in contemporary rural India
  • Employ keen detective skills to investigate crime scenes, gather clues, and uncover leads
  • Challenge suspects with intense cross-examinations, using your meticulously organized conversation log as evidence
  • Make critical decisions that impact the course of your investigation and potentially save a life
  • Explore intricately designed environments teeming with cultural insights and dark secrets
  • Experience a unique blend of gameplay inspired by "Return of the Obra Dinn" and "Tangle Tower"

Will you be the light that pierces through the darkness of a small village's secrets? Your journey to uncover the truth and save your friend begins now in "Devi: A Light in the Dark."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 600 or AMD Radeon™ equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Uncover hidden truths in a remote Indian village where a teenage girl has vanished without a trace. Step into the shoes of Devi, an amateur sleuth with a passion for detective novels, as she defies her parents' wishes to embark on a perilous journey to find her missing friend.
